entry.title: Shepard Test Stand - Feature #153: Switch to 5 Volt Version of MLX90614 IR Sensor
entry.content:
• Status changed from New to In Progress
  • Estimated time set to 3.00

I've swapped this sensor out for the 3.3 volt version in a breadboarded circuit, and they work the same. Only the supply voltage is different, as I expected. I need to build a complete sensor setup to send to J for QA testing to be sure it works properly in live testing though.
